topcarousel.title: Casamento cool
topcarousel.subtitle: for brides and grooms who don't like pimba music
topcarousel.claim: we improvise the perfect alternative music for your wedding party, with no time to finish

team.title: get to know us a bit

team1.name: Filipa Marta
team1.subtitle: Phizz is a dj from Lisbon who tries to inspire you to dance to indie, electro, synthpop and R&B. On a day-to-day basis, she's Filipa Marta, a frontend developer who makes cute websites and apps.
team1.description: Djing began in 2011 and since then he has played at various Portuguese nightclubs and festivals, including Musicbox, The Garden Rooftop, Damas, Lounge, Incógnito, Purex, 49 ZDB, Primeiro Andar, Kiosks (Time Out, Bananacafe, Bambu), Plano B, O Bom o Mau e o Vilão, . G, ILGA, DocLisboa Festival 2012 and 2013, IndieLisboa Festival 2013 and 2014, MUVI Lisboa Festival 2014, Vodafone Paredes de Coura Festival 2013, Arraial Pride 2015, Queer As Fuck 2017, Lisbon Feminist Festival 2018 and 2019.

team2.name: Filipe Pedro
team2.subtitle: Castor Mateus is the giradisquista project of Filipe Pedro, a Lusa journalist. A lover of rivers, lakes and other watery surfaces, Castor Mateus rejoices in the discovery of new independent sounds (pop/rock/electro/world).
team2.description: Incógnito, Roterdão, Sabotage, Bom Mau e Vilão, Capitólio, Cinema São Jorge, Fábrica de Braço de Prata, Fontória, Left, Bartô, Santiago Alquimista, Caixa Económica Operária (Lisbon), Tendinha, Casa de Ló (Porto), Maré de Agosto (Santa Maria, Azores), Paredes de Coura, Vila Nova de Cerveira, Andanças (Carvalhais), Madrid Me Mata 3. 0 (Madrid), Planete Mars (Paris) and Brussels are some of the clubs, festivals and cities where Castor Mateus has presented his musical discoveries.

footer.madeBy: Designed and Developed by Filipa Marta

about.text1: I'm sure you've been to weddings where the party ended early because the soundtrack wasn't appropriate, or where you ended up dancing to the “train whistle” because you were swept away.
about.text2: music is not an accessory and on such a special day it has to be dynamic, fun, get the guests dancing and make the party you've prepared last until the early hours of the morning.
about.text3: we're two professional DJs - PHIZZ and Castor Mateus - and we're dressed as cool weddings.

service4.name: We have no time to finish
service4.imgAltText: We have no time to finish

service5.name: We use our own sound and lighting equipment
service5.imgAltText: We use our own sound and lighting equipment

portfolio.subtitle: who has already married with us
portfolio.carouselImgAriaLabel: Those who have already married with us

step1.description: recepção aos convidados com muito indie e músicas do mundo, estilo sunset e boa vibe

step2.description: refeição com música mais calma dentro do jazz, bossa nova, fado e algum indie folk

step3.description: baile até de madrugada com indie rock e electrónico, synthpop, R&B, alguma música dos anos 80 e 90

pack1.text3: computer and mixing desk Traktor Kontrol Z1
pack1.text4: original CDs and purchased music (iTunes, bandCamp, etc)

pack2.text3: iPad with wi-fi and Tidal, mixing desk Reloop Mixtour

notIncluded.text2: tables to put our dj equipment on
notIncluded.text3: if the wedding is outside Lisbon, accommodation for two people

contacts.subtitle: shall we have a coffee?
contacts.description1: Like any good conversation, ours takes place over a cup of coffee, where we can get to know each other, find out what you have planned for your “D-day”, your musical tastes and budget for the party.
contacts.description2: we want to be part of the solution and your last concern.
